metadata.title: CVE-2024-46461 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: VLC media player 3.0.20 and earlier is vulnerable to denial of servicethrough an integer overflow which could be triggered with a maliciouslycrafted mms stream (heap based overflow). If successful, a malicious thirdparty could trigger either a crash of VLC or an arbitrary code executionwith the target user's privileges.

criterions.comment: vlc package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
